name: 廃集落探索
description:
Abandoned Village Exploration
This is a first-person horror game presented in a bodycam-like style.
Please be cautious about motion sickness while playing.

*Note: This is a walking simulator and does not include puzzle-solving elements.

The protagonist embarks on a journey to an abandoned village upon a friend's request...

Investigate what happened in the abandoned village in this first-person horror game.
*Contains some graphic and unsettling scenes.

Endings:
one endings.

Gameplay Duration:
Within 1 hour (estimated).

Atmosphere:
We aimed for a realistic depiction of an abandoned ruin. Enjoy the experience.

Save:
Only auto-save function available.

Let's Play and streaming are welcome!
